name: Minimal Transparent Whatsapp ☺
description: Use the Github version to customize transparency colors, privacy mode and more. A super minimal dark theme for Whatsapp. 20 settings including Background Image, Custom Colors and Fonts, Privacy and more. Due to the slowness of this platform, I strongly suggest you install the Github version with Stylus extension, for Chrome, Firefox, Opera or Edge. It will be constantly updated and brings a lot of other options to modify. For the (rgba) values, choose the color here. Custom Font: Select "Enable Custom Font" on Font Family, then write your installed font (without spaces) on Custom Font.
additional_info: Changelog is here. Forums on UserStyles.org are closed. You can report a bug o suggest new features on GitHub (you will need a Github account), by e-mail or contacting me on Twitter.

style_setting_options.label: Default
style_setting_options.value: font-family: SF Pro Text,SF Pro Icons,system,-apple-system,system-ui,BlinkMacSystemFont,Helvetica Neue,Helvetica,Lucida Grande,Kohinoor Devanagari,Arial,sans-serif;

style_setting_options.label: Times New Roman
style_setting_options.value: font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'Palatino Linotype', 'Book Antiqua', Palatino, serif!important;

style_setting_options.label: Yes
New
style_setting_options.value: #initial_startup { z-index: 1; } #initial_startup .spinner-container { display: none !important; } html[dir] ._2XERB { padding-top: 0; } html[dir="ltr"] ._2XERB { left: 0; margin-left: auto; } .progress-container { width: 100%; height: 100%; top: 0; left: 0; margin: 0; padding: 0; } progress { vertical-align: 0; position: fixed; bottom: 0; height: 6px; } html[dir="ltr"] ._36Q2N, html[dir="rtl"] ._36Q2N { animation: fade-in 0.9s; } @keyframes fade-in { from { opacity: 0; } to { opacity: 1; } }
